vessel.name: Sand Sled
vessel.description: A pirate ship capable of traveling across desert sand rather than water, allowing the Barbar Pirates to navigate the Sandora Desert.

description: The Barbar Pirates are desert pirates who operate in the Sandora Desert of Arabasta. Unlike traditional pirates who sail the seas, they use a sand-sailing ship called the Sand Sled to travel across the desert sands. They first appear in silhouette at the end of Episode 97.

keyEvents.title: Barbar Pirates First Appearance
keyEvents.description: Barbarossa and Rasa appear in silhouette at the end of the episode, teasing their upcoming encounter with the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of the desert pirate crew, setting up the filler arc.

goals: Operate as desert pirates in the Sandora Desert

reveals.information: Desert pirates exist who sail on sand instead of water
